text: Apache Warrior is a 1957 American western movie directed by Elmo Williams and was also known as Red Arrow, The Apache Kid and The Long Knives. It stars Keith Larsen, Jim Davis, Rodolfo Acosta, John Mijan, Damian O'Flynn, George Keymans and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies
title: Apache Warrior
